alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued January 14 at 11:02AM EST until January 14 at 11:30AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Central Hamilton County in eastern New York... East central Herkimer County in eastern New York... * Until 1130 AM EST. * At 1102 AM EST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from near Lake Durant Campground to 9 miles southeast of Nicks Lake Campground, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Intense bursts of heavy snow. Gusty winds leading to blowing snow and visibility rapidly falling to less than one-quarter mile. Wind gusts up to 35 mph. SOURCE...Radar and webcams. IMPACT...Travel will become difficult and potentially dangerous within minutes. Locations impacted include... Indian Lake, Speculator, Blue Mountain Lake, Lewey Lake Campground, Lake Durant Campground, Golden Beach Campground, Eagle Nest, Perkins Clearing, West Canada Lakes, Catlin Lake, Sled Harbor, Sabael, Sagamore, Sagamore Lake, and Kamp Kill Kare. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Reduce speed and turn on headlights! During snow squalls, the visibility may suddenly drop to near zero in whiteout conditions. SNOW SQUALL...OBSERVED
